name: README Auto-Setup (Runme Agent)
description: Safe-by-default README automation via Runme; optional handoff to a coding agent.

auto_run.description: If true, run after container create (otherwise just install and provide the helper CLI).

readme_file.description: Markdown file to scan for Runme blocks.

blocks.description: Comma-separated Runme block names to run (in order).

confirm_plan.description: Show a plan of the blocks to run and require user confirmation.

agent.description: Optional: if 'openhands', provide a helper stub to hand off tasks.
